Class ScaleneTriangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape
      • TwoDimensionalShape
        • Polygon
          • Triangle
            • ScaleneTriangle

  • public class ScaleneTriangle
extends Triangle
    This class will create an object that represents a scalene triangle. Every scalene triangle has three sides with all having a different length.
    Author:
    Teagen Kiel

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class Triangle

        INTERIOR_ANGLE_SUM_DEGREES, NUMBER_OF_SIDES, NUMBER_OF_VERTICES, VERTEX_A_INDEX, VERTEX_B_INDEX, VERTEX_C_INDEX

      private static void validateLengthDifference(double length1, double length2, double length3)

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScaleneTriangle

        public ScaleneTriangle(double baseLength,
                       double side1Length,
                       double side2Length)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Main constructor for class ScaleneTriangle. This constructor is essentially the same as the Triangle constructor, but with an extra level of validation to make sure each side length is a different value.
        Parameters:
        baseLength - length of the base
        side1Length - length of side 1
        side2Length - length of side 2
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if a valid triangle cannot be made, or there are two side lengths that match.

    • Method Detail

      • validateLengthDifference

        private static void validateLengthDifference(double length1,
                                             double length2,
                                             double length3)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        This extra level of validation checks to make sure all lengths are different values.
        Parameters:
        length1 - first side length
        length2 - second side length
        length3 - third side length
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there are two lengths that match
